title: WATCH | Half a century on, moon landing conspiracy theories persist
text:
There are various aspects to the Moon landing.

Despite the vast amount of evidence they did, some point to a number of perceived anomalies in the footage of the 1969 moon landings.

"What you find is that people who believe in this conspiracy theory tend to believe in others. So people who believe we never landed on the moon are also likely to believe Diana was assassinated and her death in a tunnel in Paris was not an accident," said Chris French, Professor of Psychology at Goldsmiths University

"Now there's no logical connection between those two. But what there is is a distrust of what the conspiracy believers would refer to as 'the official story'."

description: As the 50th anniversary of the groundbreaking Apollo 11 mission nears, the question that has excited conspiracy theorists for half a century is still there: Did humans actually set foot on the moon?
